img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is crouched on the ground, holding a large, ornate spear. The setting is a rocky, mountainous area with a large, leafless tree in the foreground. There is a small shrine with a golden roof and two lit fires nearby. In the background, a glowing object is highlighted by a red circular marker, suggesting it may be an item of interest or a target within the game. The environment is dark and atmospheric, with shadows and muted colors.
